text: Christopher Michael Fehn (born February 24, 1972) is an American musician and former percussionist for the band Slipknot. In Slipknot, he was known as #3. He was the joker in Slipknot. He wore a fetish type mask with a long Pinocchio style nose. He is a big fan of sports and is an avid golfer. Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:American drummers Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:Musicians from Des Moines, Iowa Category:Slipknot (band) members
title: Chris Fehn
